::Prowl/Kluster::

Prowl lands near the Cybertronian Fire, looking at it for the first time. It 
looked like a good ship, other than the engines, which seemed to be missing.

"Here she is," he says over his comm to the three bots following him, "Get 
settled in and then come back to the Ark. I'll be there repairing."

With that, Prowl flies off back to the Ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster sighs in relief as he recieves Hysteria's message. He had thought she 
was dead.

"Most of the crew is dead," he replies sadly, "Get to a CR chamber and then 
get back to the bridge. We've contacted the Maximals, and they're moving in."

He turns to Chordate, nodding. "You're right...."

Kluster turns toward a comp screen, pressing a few buttons. He rubs his chin 
slowly.

"I have an idea," he tells Chordate, "Do we have enough material to repair 
their engines?"
